title: Patanjali Fined for Substandard Ghee as Outrage Grows Over Delayed Action and Lenient Penalty
summary: A Uttarakhand court on November 27, 2025, fined Patanjali Ayurved ₹1 lakh after a 2020 sample of its “desi cow ghee” failed quality tests in two government labs. The ghee was declared substandard and unfit for...

title: Shree Siddhivinayak Ganapati Mandir: The Temple of Faith and Blessings
summary: The Shree Siddhivinayak Ganapati Mandir in Mumbai is one of the most beloved and powerful temples dedicated to Lord Ganesha. Known for granting wishes and answering prayers, it attracts thousands of devotees ev...
